baddegama kiribathawila amarawansha maha piriwenehi usas adhyapanaya labana baddegama kosala rajagiriye sugathasiri yana samanera bhikshun wahansela denama juni masa 21 wanada mahanuwara malwathu mahawihariya mangala uposathagarayedi upasampada shilayehi pihituwanu labuha.baddegama mahagoda kanda isipathanaramadhipathi, galu gangabada paththuwe pradhana sanghanayaka agaliye gunananda nahimiyange saha ga/ kristhudewa pirimi maha widyalaye aacharya shasthrapathi balangoda siriniwasa himiyange da shishya denamak wana munwahanselage mangala dharma deshanaya juni 25 wanada paswaruwehi baddegama isipathanaramayedi pawathwimatada niyamithawa thibini.

parlimenthu nyaya pathraye anthargathaya - parlimenthuwe kalanurupi sabhawaraya parlimenthu raswim aarambhawana dinaya ha kalaya aanduwe panath ketumpath piliganwima pilibanda danumdima danumdimak awashyawana ho nowana yojana shoka prakasha yojana (thibe nam) dinata niyamitha pradhana wadakatayuthu - dewani wara kiyawime panath ketumpath, eewa karaka sabha awasthawedi salaka balima yanadiya yojana, widhiwidhana, niyoga, niyamayan, giwisum, paripuraka asthamenthu, warshika wartha yanadiya paudgalika manthri yojana (sama masayakama raswim pawathwena palamu sikurada) aanduwe katayuthu (*) salakunukara dakwima wachika pilithuru apeksha nokarana prashna lipilekhanadiya piliganwima nithimaya awashyathawayaki.
api dennage wenasak na.

sadbhawaya pilibanda muladharmaya me haraha palamuwa kolombiyawe sama windithayaku ma wishwasa kere; komishan sabhawa magin owunge sakshi sandarbhiya ha naithika wishleshanayak haraha sanatha kala yuthuya.
ada fesbuk peraliya haraha siduwi aththe athithayedi durin thibu wira pa්rathirupa wetha samipa wima sandaha wishala pirisakata awasthawa labimaya.

eheth janadhipathiwaraya pawa sihinenwath nosithana andame bihisunu ghathana, paharadim sidu wanne keseda?

anuradhapura shri dalada perahara ada ha heta anuradhapura wishesha - parsi kuruneru anuradhapura aithihasika shri dalada perahara ada (30 da) saha heta (31 da) athiuthkarshawath lesa anuradhapurayedi pawathwe.
kohomawunath siyadiwi nasaganim athi moda wadak,
